Subject: Server Update
Description:
Beim Live Update auf dem Server kommt die Meldung "Database partitions are disabled! Please contact Support for assistance!" Und das Update bleibt bei 50% stehen.
Product Functionality Update - This update provides major user interface improvements and several functionality enhancements, introduces a large number of new features, and expands other capabilities. (HWA-EPP4-U0055)
Introduced new features such as Context Detection Rules, Debug Logging, a new, modern driver for Device Control. Deep Packet Inspection on Windows can work better together with third-party DLP software by enabling the "Stealthy DPI driver" feature. Made the Client Software Upgrade, Content Aware Protection Reports, and Content Aware Protection Policies pages more practical and useful. The ability to manage Request Offline Temporary Password and Authorize actions on the Endpoint Protector Client. Several enhancements include increasing the maximum number of Content Aware Protection policies. Allowlists and Denylists. New PIIs detection rules. (November 2022)
Anmerkungen: Applies to version: 5.6.0.0
View Release Notes
Während der Installation sind einige Probleme aufgetreten. Bitte Support benachrichtigen. (FEHLER: 2 - Number of maximum retries for this update reached, skipping this update...)
Solution_Comment__c: Erroneous patch has been removed and we continued the upgrade only to 5.8.1.0 because they had very old client versions installed and this was better so that they can upgrade them from the UI
